text: Leon Brown (born 26 October 1996) is a Welsh international rugby union player who plays for the Dragons regional team as a prop forward having previously played for Cross Keys RFC. ==International== Brown is a former Wales under-20 international. In August 2016 Brown was selected for the senior Wales training squad ahead of the Autumn international seriesBrown joins Wales training squad. He was included in the Wales players squad for the 2017 Autumn internationals. Brown made his Wales senior debut on 10 November 2017 versus Australia as a second half substitute.Brown Wales debut == References == == External links == *Dragons profile Category:Rugby union players from Newport, Wales Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Wales international rugby union players Category:Dragons (rugby union) players Category:Cross Keys RFC players Category:Living people Category:1996 births
title: Leon Brown (rugby union)
